UPDATE companyfinance SET row_state = 0, row_modifier = #{row_modifier,jdbcType=INTEGER}, row_modify_time = str_to_date(#{row_modify_time},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') WHERE id=#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select sd.id id, sd.purchase_name purchaseName, sd.unit, sd.amount, sd.price, sd.total, sd.paid, sd.payment, date_format(sd.row_create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') createTime, cf.companyName from supplierdetail sd, companyfinance cf where cf.id = sd.company_finance_id and sd.row_state = 1
and sd.company_finance_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and sd.row_create_time >= str_to_date(#{createTimeStart},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and sd.row_create_time <= str_to_date(#{createTimeEnd},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
order by sd.row_create_time desc
